channel.title: Enlightened Sex with Suzie Heumann
channel.description: Daily illuminations on enhancing your love life, understanding the opposite sex, and increasing your sexual pleasure. Candid and practical advice. Hosted by Suzie Heumann of HBO's Real Sex and Tantra.com.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Suzie brings you "Enlightened Sex" from Tantra.com.
channel.itunes:summary: A regular contributor to numerous magazines such as Health, Yoga Journal, Men's Health and Fitness, and Penthouse, Suzie Heumann writes most of Tantra.com's content. She speaks at conferences regarding Tantric practice, appears as workshop leader on HBO's "Real Sex in The Positions of the Kama Sutra".
channel.itunes:keywords: tantra, kama sutra, sacred sexuality, tantric sex, relationship, love, massage, lovemaking, sex tips
channel.itunes:author: Suzie Heumann
